name: Klinq
tag_list: app, iphone, drinks, beverages, android, las-vegas, vegas-tech, wine, beer, alcohol, soda, coke, stoli
overview:
Klinq is the new way to drink and be social. App users get exclusive drink deals at their favorite hangouts by pre-purchasing their first item.

Klinq has a network of venues and events; all of which are accessible through our Klinq map. The App also integrates social features, a klinq camera, commenting and the ability to send Klinq credits to friends and family.

Now you can easily send your friends a klinq credit to redeem at their venue of choice at their leisure.

Their goal is to connect EVERY beverage consumer with EVERY venue. Whether you drink beer, wine, coffee, spirits, tea, soda or water. They connect you to the Klinq network of reputable locations and managers. This will help to truly enhance the beverage experience for the customers and the business. Our users are rewarded by getting their first drink for 99¢ and our managers get to connect with you and begin know you on a personal level. A win-win for all.

Become a Klinqster. Download the Free App to get started.
